page.title: 20The future of Locks Heath
page.content: Locks Heath has a{rich historical and {cultural heritage}.However,the area is not only concerned with the past.Plans have to be made in order to prepare for the future needs of the community.To this end a wide ranging development brief has been drawn up. The{"Western Wards of Fareham Action {Area Plan"}contains information which establishes the broad principles of development in{South Hampshire}.It proposes that many more houses shall be built with associated increases in the number of schools,shops,community centres and leisure areas.It stresses that there should be sensitive landscaping so that the natural beauty of the area be preserved. Clearly,the area surrounding Locks Heath will be subjected to a great deal of change,but not necessarily at the expense of the existing community.
